channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Kohl’s stock tumbles on weak outlook as sales slide. Retailer is taking action, CEO says.
item.description: Kohl’s CEO Ashley Buchanan says that the company has “identified key areas of focus.”

item.title: Americans are using this strategy to save money on home insurance. Is it a good idea?
item.description: Homeowners frustrated with rising homeowners-insurance premiums are switching plans and opting for higher deductibles to manage their costs.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Bearish market alarms are flashing. Citi’s latest downgrade may add fuel to the fire
item.description: Like other Wall Street banks, Citigroup is worried about the state of the U.S. economy, and recommend putting money elsewhere. For now.

item.title: Verizon and AT&T are seeing stock drops. Here’s what’s driving the selloff.
item.description: Verizon calls out a more competitive wireless industry, and that’s weighing on its shares — as well as those of its peers.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Dick’s Sporting Goods faces ‘dynamic economic environment’ and issues conservative outlook
item.description: “The convergence of sport and culture in our country has never been stronger, and with a series of major sporting events set to take place in the U.S....
